module: Module-level comment: The "ex12_top" module manages the transformation of ROM outputs into hexadecimal data for 7-segment displays using switch indications and a clock signal. It utilizes a ROM submodule "rom1" to fetch outputs based on the switch state, a "bin2bcd_16" converter called "display" to convert the binary ROM outputs to BCD, and five "hex_to_7seg" modules for converting the BCD signals into 7-segment hexadecimal signals. All operations are synchronized with the "CLOCK_50".
